1.speaker: panda
1.character: また常勤さんから絵ハガキでも届かないかな
1.definition: I wonder if I'll get another postcard from Mr. Full-Time. You just got one the other day.

2.speaker: panda
2.character: ねえ　半田さん 僕を楽しませてよ

4.speaker: handa
4.character: お世話係じゃなくて　飼育係だし
4.definition: I'm not your caretaker. I'm a zoo keeper.

5.speaker: panda
5.character: いいから　何か楽しい話して
5.definition: Oh, who cares? Tell me an interesting story.

7.speaker: handa
7.character: あっ　この前河原で見つけた石見る
7.definition: Oh! Want to see the stone I found by the river the other day?

8.speaker: handa
8.character: すごくツルツルなんだ

10.speaker: handa
10.character: じゃ　昨日のスーパーの特売で…
10.definition: Then, yesterday, the supermarket had a great dea—

12.speaker: mei mei
12.character: 半様ってば　今日もステキ
12.definition: Prince Han is dreamy today, too.

15.speaker: mei mei
15.character: で　あんなところで何してたの
15.definition: So, what were you doing back there? Well, you see...

16.speaker: handa
16.character: すみません　しばらくパンダコーナーに近づかないでくれます
16.definition: I'm really sorry! But could you not come near the Panda Corner for a while?

17.speaker: handa
17.character: パンダ君に　そう言ってほしいって頼まれちゃって
17.definition: Panda asked me to tell you that.

18.speaker: rin rin
18.character: 気が散って仕事ができないってさ
18.definition: He said I was too distracting and he couldn't do his work.

19.speaker: mei mei
19.character: お兄ちゃんったら繊細ぶっちゃって
19.definition: My brother's trying to act all sensitive.

20.speaker: mei mei
20.character: ただのグータラのくせに
20.definition: He's just a lazy bum. That's not true, Mei Mei!

23.speaker: rin rin
23.character: これ見てよ　遊んでる最中に寝ちゃったんだよ
23.definition: And look at this! He fell asleep while playing.

24.speaker: rin rin
24.character: こっちなんか竹食べながら寝てるでしょ
24.definition: And over here, he fell asleep while eating bamboo.

25.speaker: rin rin
25.character: もう　かわいすぎる

26.speaker: rin rin
26.character: ねっ　わかったでしょ

27.speaker: rin rin
27.character: パンダ君は　ただのグータラじゃなくてかわいいグータラなんだよ
27.definition: Panda isn't just some lazy bum, he's a cute, lazy bum.

28.speaker: mei mei
28.character: グータラは認めるのね…
28.definition: So you'll admit to the lazy bum part...

29.speaker: rin rin
29.character: メイメイちゃんはどうして　あそこにいたの
29.definition: What were you doing there, Mei Mei?

30.speaker: mei mei
30.character: 私は半様を見守っていたの
30.definition: I was admiring... Prince Han from afar.

31.speaker: rin
31.definition: Are you talking about Mr. Handa?

32.speaker: mei
32.character: は　ん　さ　ま

34.speaker: mei
34.character: 写真もお兄ちゃんに撮ってきてもらってるんだから
34.definition: I'm having my brother take pictures of him.

35.speaker: mei
35.character: 見て　ステキでしょ

36.speaker: mei
36.character: ほら　コロコロしてて　かっこいい
36.definition: See? He looks so round and cool!

37.speaker: mei
37.character: この笑顔　下ぶくれで　垂れ目で超しびれる
37.definition: That smile! His eyes are so slanted and his face is so chubby, I die!

38.speaker: rin
38.character: このパンダ君　超かわいい
38.definition: Panda is so cute in this picture!

39.speaker: mei
39.character: 欲しいなら　あげるわよ
39.definition: I'll send it to you if you want.

40.speaker: rin
40.definition: Really?! Then I'll send you the pictures I have with Mr. Handa, as well.

42.speaker: rin
42.definition: Panda! I wish there was some way I could look at Panda all day. I know! How about the four of us go somewhere?

44.speaker: mei
44.character: そんな　私遠くから見てるだけで十分だし
44.definition: Oh, it's okay. It's plenty just for me to admire him from afar.

47.speaker: rin
47.character: やせ我慢はよくないよ
47.definition: It's not good to hold things in.

48.speaker: mei
48.definition: You promise you won't tell anyone?

51.speaker: mei
51.character: 実は　サインがもらえたらなって思ってるの
51.definition: I was thinking it'd be great if I could get his autograph!

52.speaker: rin
52.character: サインって　半田さんの

53.speaker: mei
53.definition: In his own handwriting, if possible!

54.speaker: rin
54.character: だったら　出かけたときにもらえばいいじゃない
54.definition: Then why don't you get one when we all go out?

55.speaker: mei
55.character: えぇ　でも　図々しくない
55.definition: But isn't that being a little presumptuous? Not at all! I'll invite Mr. Handa, so make sure you invite Panda.

56.speaker: mei
56.definition: What am I going to do?

58.speaker: rin
58.character: あの　今度の休み 遊びに行きませんか
58.definition: Would you like to go somewhere on your next day off?

59.speaker: handa
59.character: えっ　僕と どうしたんですか急に
59.definition: Huh? With me? What brought this on?

60.speaker: rin
60.character: 実は　半田さんともっと仲よくなりたいって女の子がいるんです
60.definition: I actually know a girl who'd like to get to know you better.

62.speaker: kirino
62.character: きっと笹子さんですよ

64.speaker: kirino
64.character: だって　先輩の知り合いの女の子って他にいないじゃないですか
64.definition: Well, she's the only girl you know.

65.speaker: handa
65.character: 少しはいるよ えと　ほら　あの…
65.definition: I know a few others... Like um...

67.speaker: kirino
67.character: こんなチャンス　逃しちゃダメですよ
67.definition: You can't let this chance pass you by!

68.speaker: kirino
68.character: 笹子さんのこと 好きなんですよね

70.speaker: handa
70.character: ってなんで知ってるの
70.definition: Hey! How do you know that?

71.speaker: kirino
71.character: えっ　みんな知ってますよ

72.speaker: handa
72.character: そうなの　みんなって

73.speaker: kirino
73.character: ラマさんとか　マンドリル君とか コアリクイ君とか　アカカワイノシシさんとか
73.definition: Well, there's Mr. Llama, Mandrill, Anteater, and even Mr. Red River Hog.

74.speaker: handa
74.character: アカカワイノシシさんまで

75.speaker: kirino
75.character: じゃ　オーケーってことで よろしくお願いします
75.definition: All right, that's a yes. Please look after him.

76.speaker: rin
76.character: よかった　詳しいことはまた連絡しますね
76.definition: Thank goodness. I'll contact you with the details later.

78.speaker: mei
78.character: 今度のお休み　遊びにいかない
78.definition: would you like to go somewhere on your next day off?

80.speaker: mei
80.definition: No, there'd be four of us.

83.speaker: mei
83.character: ファン　お兄ちゃんのこと大好きなファンの人と
83.definition: A couple fans! They're huge fans of yours.

84.speaker: panda
84.character: えっ　ファン ファンか　しかたないなぁ
84.definition: What? Fans? Fans, eh? Looks like I have no other choice.

87.speaker: handa
87.character: な…　なに　パンダ君

88.speaker: panda
88.character: 僕　今度　ファンの子と遊びにいくんだ
88.definition: I'm going to go hang out with some fans of mine.

92.speaker: panda
92.character: どんな接待を受けるのかなぁ
92.definition: I wonder how they'll entertain me. Eat lots and lots! You're so cute when you're eating bamboo, Mr. Panda!

93.speaker: handa
93.definition: He seems so happy. But on my next day off...

94.speaker: handa
94.character: 見てください　笹子さんツルツルです
94.definition: Look, Miss Sasako! It's so smooth!

95.speaker: sasako
95.character: ほら　半田さん こっちも　ツルツル
95.definition: Look, Mr. Handa! This one is, too!

99.speaker: sasako
99.character: このメガネ　怒ってるときにかければいいんじゃないかと思って
99.definition: I thought it might be a good idea to wear these glasses when I'm angry.

100.speaker: sasako
100.character: 私　よく怒ってても笑ってるって言われるんで
100.definition: People tell me that I still smile when I'm mad, so...

103.speaker: penguin
103.character: だったら外してもらえるかな なんだか怖いよ
103.definition: Could you take those off, then? You look pretty scary.

104.speaker: sasako
104.character: えっ　結構　気に入ってるのに
104.definition: What? But I really like them... You'll scare any customers that come in. Right?

105.speaker: polar bear
105.character: ビックリさせてみたいから お客さん連れてきてよ
105.definition: I'd like to scare some customers, so could you bring some in for me?

106.speaker: penguin
106.character: お店が　ヒマだからって
106.definition: Just because things are quiet, don't try to get me to go bring people in.

107.speaker: rin
107.character: 予定は　バッチリ押さえたよ

108.speaker: rin
108.character: あとは最高の演出を考えなきゃ
108.definition: We just have to think of the perfect situation.

109.speaker: mei
109.character: ステキな１日にしなくちゃね
109.definition: We have to make it a wonderful day.

110.speaker: mei
110.character: いよいよ明日ね　リンリン

112.speaker: mei
112.character: それが聞いてくれる 私ちょっと迷っちゃって
112.definition: Well, actually... Will you help me decide?

113.speaker: mei
113.character: やっぱり　サインは色紙かしら
113.definition: I should probably get an autograph board signed.

114.speaker: mei
114.character: でも　お気に入りのハンカチも捨てがたいし
114.definition: But there's my favorite handkerchief, too...

116.character: これにもらうっていうのもステキ
116.definition: It'd be amazing to have him sign this, too.

117.speaker: mei
117.character: アハーッ　ホント迷っちゃう
117.definition: Oh, I don't know what to do!

118.speaker: rin
118.character: 全部にもらったらいいじゃない
118.definition: Why don't you get them all signed?

120.speaker: mei
120.character: イヤーッ　そんな　図々しい

121.speaker: mei
121.definition: But maybe I do want them.

122.speaker: rin
122.character: うん　それじゃ　また明日ね

123.speaker: rin
123.character: メイメイちゃんってばはしゃいじゃって
123.definition: Oh, Mei Mei, you're so excited.

124.speaker: rin
124.character: そうだ　記念に写真館で写真を撮るのはどうだろう
124.definition: I know! What if we took some commemorative pictures at a portrait studio?

125.speaker: rin
125.character: スーツならゴシック調のセットで
125.definition: I could wear a suit, in a Gothic setting.

126.speaker: rin
126.character: いや　パンダ君とお似合いな感じなら
126.definition: Wait. I could also go twinsies with Panda. I can't choose! They're both so amazing! Oh, that's good, too! And that, too! I got too excited.

127.speaker: mei
127.character: 来られないって　どうして
127.definition: What do you mean you can't make it?

128.speaker: rin
128.character: ごめんね　熱が出ちゃって
128.definition: I'm sorry. I have a fever.

129.speaker: rin
129.character: 風邪だったらうつしちゃ悪いから
129.definition: If it's a cold, I wouldn't want you to catch it,

130.speaker: rin
130.definition: so you three go on and have fun.

132.speaker: rin
132.character: そうそう　お昼は「グリル・ド・バンブー」っていうお店がいいよ
132.definition: Oh, and for lunch, you guys should go to a place called Grilled Bamboo.

133.speaker: rin
133.character: クーポン　あとでメールするね
133.definition: I'll text you a coupon in a bit.

134.speaker: rin
134.character: 頑張ってね　メイメイちゃん
134.definition: Do your best, Mei Mei. Rin Rin!

137.speaker: rin
137.character: みんな楽しんでるんだろうな

138.speaker: rin
138.character: 林厘太郎　一生の不覚

141.speaker: rin
141.character: メイメイちゃん　どうして…

142.speaker: mei
142.character: いいからいいから　熱はどう
142.definition: Don't worry about it. How's your fever? Come on, you should be laying down.

143.speaker: rin
143.character: メイメイちゃん わざわざお見舞い　ありがとう

146.speaker: mei
146.character: リンリンの気持は誰よりも私が知ってるんだから
146.definition: I know how you feel better than anyone else.

147.speaker: mei
147.character: １人で楽しむなんてできないわ
147.definition: I couldn't go have fun just by myself.

150.speaker: mei
150.character: はい　おかゆどうぞ
150.definition: Here you go. Have some rice porridge.

152.speaker: mei
152.definition: Come on, eat up. It's too cute to eat!

153.speaker: mei
153.character: ほら　早く食べて食べて

154.speaker: rin
154.character: それじゃ　いただきます
154.definition: All right. Thank you for the food.

155.speaker: rin
155.character: これ　チョコレートで描いたの
155.definition: Did you draw the face with chocolate?

160.speaker: mei
160.character: 元気になったらまたお出かけ計画しようね
160.definition: Once you're feeling better,let's plan another outing. We'll have a great time.

161.speaker: mei
161.character: もちろん 絶対に半様のサインをもらうわ
161.definition: Of course! I'm going to get Prince Han's autograph, no matter what!

162.speaker: mei
162.character: アハハッ　言っちゃった　恥ずかしい
162.definition: Oh, I said it! How embarrassing!

163.speaker: mei
163.character: もう　私ったら　いつからこんな大胆になったのかしら
163.definition: When did I become so bold?

164.speaker: handa
164.character: えと　パンダ君　あれ

165.speaker: panda
165.character: 水くさいな　半田さん
165.definition: You're so reserved, Mr. Handa. Huh?

166.speaker: panda
166.character: そんなに好きなら言ってくれればいいのに
166.definition: If you like me so much, you should just say so. What?!

167.speaker: panda
167.character: 半田さん　僕のファンだったんだね
167.definition: So you were one of my fans, Mr. Handa...

172.speaker: penguin
172.character: 暇になるたび そのメガネかけるのやめてくれる
172.definition: Could you stop wearing those glasses whenever it's slow?

173.speaker: polar bear
173.character: ようこそ　僕の故郷　北極へ
173.definition: Welcome... to my hometown, the North Pole!

174.speaker: grizzly
174.definition: Like hell it's the North Pole.

175.speaker: grizzly
175.character: 思いっきり日本だよ　ここは

176.speaker: polar bear
176.character: 夢がないなぁ　グリズリー君は

177.speaker: grizzly
177.character: 夢見せてぇなら寝かしてくれよ
177.definition: If you want me to dream, then let me sleep! Thank you for driving us up here, even though you're in the middle of hibernating. Yeah, well, we're here now.

178.speaker: grizzly
178.character: ほら　さっさと始めろよ
178.definition: Come on, let's get this show on the road.

179.speaker: polar bear
179.character: それでは第１回ワカサギ釣り大会を始めるよ
179.definition: And now we will commence the first annual smelt fishing competition.

180.speaker: polar bear
180.character: いちばん釣れた人には賞品を出します
180.definition: Whoever gets the most gets a prize.

182.speaker: grizzly
182.character: 俺は　車で寝てるからな
182.definition: I'll be sleeping in the car. Call me when you're done.

184.speaker: grizzly
184.character: お前は　ワカサギ釣ってろ
184.definition: You stay here and fish smelts. What?

185.speaker: panda
185.character: じゃあ　賞品ちょうだい

187.speaker: penguin
187.character: フンッ　まあ　賞品は僕のものだね
187.definition: The prize is as good as mine.

189.speaker: penguin
189.character: 僕が何者か　忘れてない
189.definition: Did you forget who I am?

191.speaker: penguin
191.character: 違うよ　ペンギン　ペ　ン　ギ　ン

192.speaker: penguin
192.character: 僕が　本気になれば魚なんて…
192.definition: If I get serious, there won't be an end...

194.speaker: panda
194.character: そんな獲り方したワカサギを食べるの嫌だな
194.definition: I don't think I want to eat any smelts you catch like that.

195.speaker: sasako
195.definition: I'm not sure about that, either.

197.speaker: panda
197.character: ねぇねぇ　ワカサギって　懲役何年
197.definition: So, how many years do you get for baiting smelts? This has nothing to do with that kind of "bait," so I'm just going to omit an explanation, okay?

198.speaker: sasako
198.character: どのあたりがいいんですかね
198.definition: I wonder where would be best? Mr. Penguin, it's times like this you should use your famous sophistry.

199.speaker: penguin
199.character: それを言うならうんちくじゃないかな
199.definition: I think by that, you mean my vast sophistication.

200.speaker: penguin
200.character: でも　ワカサギ釣りのことはよく知らないよ
200.definition: But I actually don't know that much about smelt fishing.

201.speaker: panda
201.character: 結局　役に立たないなんて ペンギンさんらしいね
201.definition: It's so like you to beof no use at all, Mr. Penguin.

202.speaker: penguin
202.character: そんな　らしさはむしろいらないね
202.definition: I don't need that kind of likeness! How about we look it up on the Internet?

204.speaker: penguin
204.character: えっと…　ワカサギの群れは泳ぐルートがだいたい決まっているので
204.definition: Let's see. "The route that smelt swim is rather predictable, so as soon as that place is found, even beginners can catch a lot.

205.speaker: penguin
205.character: ワカサギは　湖の流れにのって回遊していることが多いです
205.definition: Smelt tend to follow the current of the lake.

206.speaker: penguin
206.character: 流れが当たって戻ってくるポイントには群れが多く
206.definition: So at the point where the current changes direction, fish will tend to gather, so it's a great thing to look out for." So, somewhere like this.

207.speaker: penguin
207.character: わかってるなら調べさせないでよ
207.definition: If you already know, don't have me look it up! "The trick to fishing smelt, is to lure the fish by wiggling the line.

208.speaker: penguin
208.definition: And then stopping now and then."

209.speaker: penguin
209.character: あっ　５秒くらいでいいって
209.definition: Oh, it says that five seconds is enough.

210.speaker: penguin
210.character: みんな　もう動かして
210.definition: Start moving again, everyone! "Move the line up and down to attract the fish to the bait.

211.character: アタリを確かめながら誘いの幅とリズムを掴む
211.definition: Check your surroundings to determine the range and rhythm of the movement."

212.speaker: penguin
212.character: 揺らして　揺らして　止めて
212.definition: Wiggle, wiggle, stop! Wiggle, wiggle, stop!

213.speaker: sasako
213.character: ちっとも釣れませんね
213.definition: I don't seem to be having any luck.

214.speaker: polar bear
214.character: ペンギンさんがうるさいからじゃないかな
214.definition: I think it's because Mr. Penguin is being too noisy. Then I'll go get them myself!

215.speaker: sasako
215.character: すみません やめてもらえますか
215.definition: I'm sorry, could you not do that?

216.speaker: panda
216.definition: I've got a big haul! Those aren't smelt.

217.speaker: sasako
217.character: パンダ君　竹やぶ見つけたの
217.definition: Did you find a bamboo thicket, Panda?

218.speaker: panda
218.character: そう　ここの竹はいい竹だよ
218.definition: Yeah. The bamboo here is really good.

219.speaker: panda
219.character: 釣りなんかやめて竹取り大会に変更しよう
219.definition: Let's stop fishing, and change this into a bamboo fetching contest.

221.speaker: penguin
221.character: 変更しないに変更していいかな
221.definition: How about I change it to we don't change it. Oh, by the way, I have some smelt, too.

223.speaker: panda
223.character: 竹やぶに行く途中 たくさん釣ってる人がいてね…
223.definition: On my way to get bamboo, there were some people who had caught a bunch.

224.speaker: panda
224.character: すごいな たくさん釣れてるな

225.speaker: panda
225.character: いいな　うらやましいな

226.speaker: guy
226.definition: Would you like some? Thanks! That's rather shameless.

227.speaker: sasako
227.character: 優しい人でよかったね
227.definition: I'm glad they were nice people.

228.speaker: polar bear
228.definition: I'm going to do a lap around the lake, too. How about you fish?

229.speaker: sasako
229.character: あっ　来たかも　どうしよう
229.definition: Oh! I might have caught one! What should I do?

230.speaker: penguin
230.character: 引いて引いて　ゆっくりね

232.speaker: sasako
232.definition: But that's finally our first one.

233.speaker: penguin
233.definition: One would be enough for one bite.

234.speaker: panda
234.character: ワカサギって小さいもんね

236.speaker: panda
236.definition: Do they get any bigger? Smelts...

237.speaker: polar bear
237.character: 子供の頃が一番大きいんだ
237.definition: are the biggest when they're young. And then as they mature, they divide. Once there are enough to be considered a school,

238.speaker: polar bear
238.character: このサイズになるんだ
238.definition: they're about this size. Wow! That's amazing!

239.speaker: panda
239.character: じゃあ　シロクマ君も大きいからいつかは小さくなるの
239.definition: So since you're so big, Polar Bear, does that mean you'll shrink one day, too? Yep. I'll be my own herd.

241.speaker: polar bears
241.character: ジュウゴ　リュウコウ

243.speaker: penguin
243.character: もういいから　釣りやろうよ

245.speaker: penguin
245.character: そりゃ　キミは釣りしていないしね
245.definition: Well, you aren't even fishing. I think I'm gonna go sleep in the car after all. This seems hopeless. Then I'll—

246.speaker: sasako
246.definition: That's quite all right. Oh. I see.

248.speaker: penguin
248.definition: Did you think of a good idea—

249.speaker: polar bear
249.definition: Big winner! A snowball fight? All right! Take that! Take that!

250.speaker: panda
250.character: よいしょ　よいしょ
250.definition: Here we go. Here we go. Here we go!

253.speaker: grizzly
253.character: お前ら　釣りはどうしたんだ釣りは
253.definition: What the hell happened to fishing? We sort of forgot our original motive.

254.speaker: grizzly
254.definition: So did you catch anything? Well...

255.speaker: grizzly
255.character: 何しにここまで来たんだ
255.definition: The hell did we come all the way up here for?

256.speaker: grizzly
256.character: ったく　しようがねえヤツらだな
256.definition: You guys are hopeless, damn it. Wow, you caught a lot. It certainly is a big catch! There best times for catching smelt are just before sunrise and just after sunset.

257.speaker: grizzly
257.character: 時間帯も結構影響あるんだよ
257.definition: So timing has a lot to do with it.

258.speaker: penguin
258.definition: Wow, that's impressive. If you're satisfied, we're heading home.

259.speaker: sasako
259.character: そういえば　シロクマさんは…
259.definition: By the way, where did Mr. Polar Bear... The hell is that? Welcome. So warm. This is amazing. A café made of ice.

260.speaker: penguin
260.character: そういえば　ワカサギ釣りの賞品は
260.definition: By the way, what's the prize for smelt fishing? We all got some, so everyone will be getting the prize. All right, here you go. A dish made from smelts.

261.speaker: polar bear
261.character: ピザも焼いているからね
261.definition: I have a pizza baking right now, too. That smells good.

262.speaker: guy
262.character: あったかいコーヒー２つ

265.speaker: sasako
265.definition: There's been an addition to an order.

266.speaker: sasako
266.character: このワカサギでパスタをお願いします
266.definition: Please make pasta with these smelts. Hey! The fried fish is coming up!

268.speaker: panda
268.character: 店員さん　笹おかわり
268.definition: I'd like more bamboo grass, Mr. Waiter!

269.speaker: penguin
269.character: 本来　僕も　そっち側だから
269.definition: I'm usually on that side, too! Two more customers coming in!

270.speaker: polar bear
270.character: 出張　しろくまカフェへ　ようこそ
270.definition: Welcome to the off-site Polar Bear's Café!

271.speaker: panda
271.character: ねぇ　ペンギンさん　おかわりまだ
271.definition: Hey, Mr. Penguin, where are my seconds?

272.speaker: penguin
272.character: ちょっと　パンダ君も手伝ってよ
272.definition: Hey! You should be helping, too, Panda!

273.speaker: panda
273.character: ピンギンさん  ピンギンさん

275.speaker: panda
275.character: ピンギンさんはどんな時　パンダ様って呼びたくなる
275.definition: When are the times you want to refer to me as Master Panda?

276.speaker: penguin
276.character: どんな時にって　基本ないかな

279.speaker: sasako
279.character: あの　輸入のCDをあげた時の匂いってなんなんですかね
279.definition: Um, what's that smell when you open import CDs?

280.speaker: penguin
280.character: 笹子さん 急すぎ CDの話かけろもしなかったよ
280.definition: Miss Sasako, too sudden. We didn't say a single word about CDs.

282.speaker: polar bear
282.character: 来週のしろくまカフェは
282.definition: Next week's Polar Bear Café will be brought to you using real animal voices.
